msg.msgText:
An "LTPAProfile" composite object can be deleted by using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete LTPAProfile help imaserver delete LTPAProfile "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete LTPAProfile "Name=LtpaProfile"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
